sentences.english: This paper summarized the resent knowledge on heavy metal and pathogenic organisms in sludge.
sentences.chinese: 文章概述了有關污泥中重金屬及病源體的研究狀況。

sentences.english: The etiologies and pathophysiology of the interested diseases are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了該類病的病理學及病源學的研究成果。

sentences.english: Estimating the importance of all known sources is therefore extremely difficult.
sentences.chinese: 因此，對所有已知病源的重要性做出估計就極爲困難。

sentences.english: It needs seeking both a temporary solution and a permanent cure to solve the corruption problem.
sentences.chinese: 解決腐敗問題需要標本兼治，其前提是找準病源。

sentences.english: I think that diseases, other viruses and other pathogens, can behave differently.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲，另一些病毒及病源體的表現有所不同。

sentences.english: May be related to rectal inflammation and a variety of pathogenic micro-organisms on the invasion of the intestinal tract.
sentences.chinese: 可能與直腸炎症及多種病源微生物對腸道的侵襲有關。

sentences.english: Pathogens, such as bacteria, fungus, virus, have carbohydrates protruding outside of its surface.
sentences.chinese: 細菌，黴菌，病毒等病源表面有一些多醣體的突起。

definition: correct diagnosis/to prescribe the right cure for an illness/to suit the medicine to the illness
